meanings: (생각·감정 등이) disappear, go (away); (갑자기) vanish; (서서히) fade away

vlive.korean: 고양이를 키우기 시작하면서 그 꿈은 사라진지 오래고요. But since we started to live with cats here, I can no longer dream of that. 듣기 View video V Animal Family : 고양이 보금자리 새단장! New interior for Cats! (ft. 박정윤수의사)
vlive.english: But since we started to live with cats here, I can no longer dream of that.

vlive.korean: 근데 저는 정연이가 사라진지도 몰랐어요. - 나도 몰랐어요. - 나도 지금 알았어. But I didn't notice she was gone. - Me, neither. - I just found out. 듣기 View video TWICE : [FULL] TWICE SHOWCASE #4 SIGNAL
vlive.english: But I didn't notice she was gone. - Me, neither. - I just found out.

vlive.korean: 사흘째 안 사라져 - 그렇지? I've had it for four days. - Right? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 댕냥스쿨 EP.7🐶🐱!!!
vlive.english: I've had it for four days. - Right?

vlive.korean: 사라졌어! The post has gone! 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🐱🐹🐿🦋🍞🐰
목걸이가 왜 사라졌냐고요? Why did my necklace disappear? 듣기 View video iKON : 같이 운동하자!!

examples.korean: Dinosaurs have long since perished, but sharks are still going strong. 발음듣기 공룡이 사라진 지는 이미 오래되었지만 상어들은 여전히 건재하다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Dinosaurs have long since perished, but sharks are still going strong. 발음

examples.korean: Twenty-eight years after his disappearance, Kim Yong-nam was reunited with his mother and older sister. 발음듣기 그가 사라진 지 28년 만에 김영남은 어머니, 누나와 상봉했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Twenty-eight years after his disappearance, Kim Yong-nam was reunited with his mother and older sister. 발음

examples.korean: 72 years have passed since the famous female aviator Amelia Earhart disappeared while attempting to fly around the world. 발음듣기 유명한 여성 비행사 아멜리아 에어하트가 전 세계를 비행하는 도전을 하는 동안 사라진 지 72년이 흘렀다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: 72 years have passed since the famous female aviator Amelia Earhart disappeared while attempting to fly around the world. 발음

examples.korean: Oh, she is long since lost. 발음듣기 오, 그녀는 사라진 지 오래다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 지렁이(why0****) Web Collection
examples.english: Oh, she is long since lost. 발음

examples.korean: It’s been five years since Maggie's husband vanished. 발음듣기 매기의 남편이 사라진지 5년이 지났다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. kdyshjhj(kdys****) Web Collection
